DOC.brief_summary: 1. To establish the culture positivity rate in adjustable suture strabismus surgery 2. To identify bacterial species and antibiotic susceptibility patterns of microorganisms cultured from suture material 3. To compare suture contamination rates with techniques to reduce the suture contamination rate
DOC.brief_title: Suture Contamination Rate in Adjustable Suture Strabismus Surgery
DOC.criteria: All strabismus patients age â‰¥ 18 years scheduled for strabismus surgery with adjustable sutures at the Bascom Palmer Eye Institute will be invited to participate. Patient who has a history of allergy to povidoneiodine. Disorders affecting immune function. Patient who is unwilling to participate in the study
